title: Are there any other original plantations in this area beside the Clarendon Plantation that are not open to the public?
text:
Orton Plantation recently changed owners and is not open to the
public:

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=984

Pleasant Oaks Plantation is also privately owned and not open to the
public:

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4120

For more on Cladendon Plantation:

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4742
